text:
@JuliaDavisNews @AshaRangappa_ The Trump administration & right wing media, esp #FoxNews, are killing people. 

& to those who say Mr Joyce made this choice, no. He believed what he heard from a president & station he trusted. Their craven dishonesty & self-serving propaganda, killed him. #COVID19 #pandemic
